metadata.title: Thursday, 8th June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following roads in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Mfuwe - Mwanya; (ii) Chikomeni - Mwanya; and (iii) Chanyalubwe - Chitungulu;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the following markets in Mongu Central Parliamentary Constituency:

(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 75) W17. Mr Kafwaya (Lunte) - to ask the Minister of Health how many of the newly recruited health workers had been deployed to health facilities that had been in existence for:
